data.actual_result: You get on voice automatically, cant hear anyone talk but you can hear people leave and join. It also doesn't say you're connected
data.expected_result: You rejoin the server without being on voice automatically
data.short_description: When kicked out of server while on voice & rejoin the same server you'd still hear the sounds for when someone joins and leaves the voice chat even when you're not in it / says you're on it
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat - Get kicked - Rejoin then bug happens
